replies.body: Everytime you run League, it needs to connect to the patcher to check for updates.  You can try grabbing League from another pc and putting it in a thumb drive, but there is a risk of data corruption and requiring game file repairs.  Otherwise, it sounds like your connection is unstable if it's getting cut off from the patching server.  You'll want to run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help pinpoint the cause and squash it.
